snippet: Banks based in Britain seeking to do business in the European Union after Brexit should apply early for a licence to set up actual operations and not "empty shells", European Central Bank supervisor Sabine Lautenschlaeger said on Thursday....

headline.main: UK Banks Need to Build Operations in EU Post-Brexit-ECB
headline.print_headline: UK Banks Need to Build Operations in EU Post-Brexit-ECB

lead_paragraph: Banks based in Britain seeking to do business in the European Union after Brexit should apply early for a licence to set up actual operations and not "empty shells", European Central Bank supervisor Sabine Lautenschlaeger said on Thursday.
